column1: The '''Old Mill''' was the water-mill of [[Hobbiton]], owned and run by the [[Sandyman Family]].<ref>{{FR
column2: I1}}</ref> The Old Mill was a corn mill powered by a large water wheel. It lay directly adjacent to the bridge across [[the Water]] and next to the [[Old Grange]] as well.
